item.title: Dashboard Insight's Dashboard Gallery
item.description: Dashboard Insight has an extensive collection of screenshots of information dashboards that are worth a look. http://dashboardinsight.com/dashboards/gallery/gallery-article.aspx

item.title: Federal IT Dashboard
item.description: This is a new dashboard that tracks the U.S. Government's reported spending on technology. http://it.usaspending.gov/

item.title: chartbeat dashboard
